subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: A decision is expected on a rule that bars any athlete who has served a doping suspension of six months or longer from competing in the next Olympics, even if the suspension ends before the Games.
snippet: A decision is expected on a rule that bars any athlete who has served a doping suspension of six months or longer from competing in the next Olympics, even if the suspension ends before the Games.
